markdownRemark.html: The Feedback Loop from Hell has become a borderline epidemic, making many of us overly stressed, overly neurotic, and overly self-loathing. Back in Grandpa's day, he would feel like shit and think to himself, "Geezwhiz, I sure do feel like a cow turd today. But hey, I guess that's just life. Back to shoveling hay."

frontmatter.title: Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
